means: 沉默寡言的，不爱说话的

sentence.Network_en: A taciturn man, he replied to my questions in monosyllables.
sentence.Network_cn: 他寡言少语，回答我的问题时只是往外蹦单字。

sentence.Network_en: The ant is the most industrious animal; however, it is the most taciturn one.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有任何动物比蚂蚁更勤奋, 然而它却最沉默寡言.

sentence.Network_en: But these men were a taciturn lot , picking their words carefully.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是这些人都是沉默寡言的人, 说起话来字斟句酌,非常谨慎.

老成（tact）、缄默（tacit）、不苟言笑（taciturn）、触觉（tactile）、笨拙（clumsy）。老成是老练怪人（freak）和书呆子。
tacit 缄默的；不言而喻的taciturn adj. 沉默寡言的；无言的，不太说话的referee n. 裁判员；调解人；介绍人 vi. 担任裁判；仲裁 vt. 为…当裁判；调停.
tacit 缄默的；不言而喻的taciturn adj. 沉默寡言的；无言的，不太说话的referee n. 裁判员；调解人；介绍人 vi. 担任裁判；仲裁 vt. 为…当裁判；调停.

list.abs: He a wooden - faced individual , extremely taciturn , and his contributions to the conversation were mostly monosyllables ., 他有一张非常独特的木纳的脸 , 极其的沉默 , 他说话时吐出来的总是一个一个的单音节.

on Saturday , Bryant gave an interview , if it can be called that , filled with cliches and short sentences that provided little insight , continuing his recent taciturn stance with reporters .周六，布莱恩特接受了一个采访，如果可以那样说，全都是陈词滥调和短句子组成见解，依旧保持着最近对媒体低调的态度。
#花卉英语# 紫萁（Royal Fern） 花语是沉默（Taciturnity）。2月24的生日花 05月12日萨拉之恋收藏 7  #花卉英语# Portulaca grandifl.
He reverted to his old taciturn ways ., 他又恢复了他的静默寡言.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Latin taciturnus, from tacitus (see tacit)

entry.tran: 寡言少语的;沉默寡言的;不苟言笑的
entry.def: A taciturn person does not say very much and can seem unfriendly.

example.ex: A taciturn man, he replied to my questions in monosyllables.
example.tran: 他寡言少语，回答我的问题时只是往外蹦单字。

auth_sentence.content: As I am naturally taciturn...maintaining silence...did not dismay me.

sentences.cn: 没有任何动物比蚂蚁更勤奋，然而它却最沉默寡言。

sentences.en: Why do the aged tend to be taciturn?
sentences.cn: 很多老年人为什么沉默寡言？
